main: ^(Phew... Finally, after a long first day...)
^(Suddenly, the entrance portal flashes and opens up!)
^E-excuse me, we're closing now, so if you could please--
^(A massive, towering figure exits the portal.)
^(It's almost like... if a galaxy was a person...)
^(I can't tell if it has eyes, but I somehow feel them staring into my soul...)

c-0: ^I am the owner of The Portal Diner.
^Oh! Right! Yeah, of course! Hi, uh, thank you, for, uh, hiring me, and, and, uh, I'm Graciana!
^(They hold out an envelope without saying anything else, and I slowly reach for it.)
c-1: ^Who's Graciana? I-I've never heard that n-name before...
^I am the owner of The Portal Diner.
^O-oh! Y-yeah! Right, s-sorry, I, uh, yeah, uh, I am, uh, Graciana, ha, ha, s-sorry, I, uh, j-just--
^(O'Ryan holds out an envelope without a word. They gesture for me to take it.)

continue: ^(In complete silence, O'Ryan turns and leaves the Diner.)
^(I finish closing up and head on home, envelope in hand.)
